refnamediv.refpurpose: Contains the audio data and its alignment

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: AgsAudioSignal organizes audio data within a GList whereby data pointing to the buffer.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_get_length_till_current ()
refsect2.para: Counts the buffers from stream_beginning upto stream_current.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_add_stream ()
refsect2.para: Adds a buffer at the end of the stream.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_stream_resize ()
refsect2.para: Resizes an AgsAudioSignal's stream but be carefull with shrinking. This function may crash the application.

entry.para: a guint as the new length.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_stream_safe_resize ()
refsect2.para: Resizes an AgsAudioSignal's stream but doesn't shrink more than the current stream position.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_realloc_buffer_size ()
refsect2.para: Realloc the stream to the new buffer size.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_morph_samplerate ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_audio_signal_morph_samplerate (AgsAudioSignal *audio_signal, guint samplerate, double k_morph);
refsect2.para: Morph audio quality to new samplerate.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_copy_buffer_to_buffer ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_audio_signal_copy_buffer_to_buffer (signed short *destination, guint dchannels, signed short *source, guint schannels, guint size);
refsect2.para: Copy a buffer to an other buffer.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_copy_buffer_to_double_buffer ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_audio_signal_copy_buffer_to_double_buffer (double *destination, guint dchannels, signed short *source, guint schannels, guint size);
refsect2.para: Copy a buffer to an other buffer.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_copy_double_buffer_to_buffer ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_audio_signal_copy_double_buffer_to_buffer (signed short *destination, guint dchannels, double *source, guint schannels, guint size);
refsect2.para: Copy a buffer to an other buffer.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_duplicate_stream ()
refsect2.para: Copy stream of one audio signal to another

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_get_stream_current ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve next current stream of AgsAudioSignal list.

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_get_by_recall_id ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve next audio signal refering to recall_id

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a AgsAudioSignal, with defaults of soundcard , linking recycling tree and refering to recall_id .

entry.para: the AgsRecallID, it can be NULL if AGS_AUDIO_SIGNAL_TEMPLATE is set

refsect2.title: ags_audio_signal_new_with_length ()
refsect2.programlisting: AgsAudioSignal * ags_audio_signal_new_with_length (GObject *soundcard, GObject *recycling, GObject *recall_id, guint length);
refsect2.para: Creates a AgsAudioSignal, with defaults of soundcard , linking recycling tree and refering to recall_id . The audio data is tiled to length frame count.

entry.para: the AgsRecallID, it can be NULL if AGS_AUDIO_SIGNAL_TEMPLATE is set

refsect2.title: The “buffer-size” property
refsect2.para: The buffer size to be used.

refsect2.title: The “soundcard” property
refsect2.para: The assigned AgsSoundcard providing default settings.

refsect2.title: The “morph-samplerate” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AgsAudioSignal *audio_signal, guint samplerate, gdouble arg2, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: The ::morph-samplerate signal is invoked to notify modified samplerate.

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The “realloc-buffer-size” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AgsAudioSignal *audio_signal, guint buffer_size, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: The ::reallloc-buffer-size signal is invoked to notify modified buffer size.

entry.para: the object to realloc buffer size

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.
